artist: Artist: Nicolas Africano; Publisher: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; man facing front wearing baggy pants; hat with round brim at alight angle; vegetation in PR hand
inscription: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Chop
markings: LL: VEL chop mark; LL in pencil: [AP 5/5]
signed: lower margin in pencil: [Nicolas Africano 1990]; at top in grey: [May befor the storm/ still human]
title: May - Before the Storm, Still Human, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
